DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled , crossover study evaluate pressor effect pseudoephedrine administer TR-701 FA healthy adult volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Crossover Study Blood Pressure Heart Rate Response
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible subject randomize 1 2 possible treatment sequence ( N=9 per sequence ) Study Day 1 . Subjects receive oral 200 mg TR 701 FA Placebo TR 701 FA daily 5 day treatment period , 2 day washout period ( 72 hour dos ) . On Study Day 5 treatment period , subject also receive oral 60 mg PSE .
DOC.criteria: Male female subject 18 45 year age , inclusive Healthy male females clinically significant abnormality identify detailed medical history Body mass index ≥ 19.0 kg/m2 ≤ 31.0 kg/m2 Systolic blood pressure > 130 mmHg < 90 mmHg measure 10 minute supine Screening Visit Study Day 1 Diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg < 60 mmHg measure 10 minute supine Screening Visit Study Day 1 Heart rate > 90 bpm < 50 bpm measure 10 minute supine Screening Visit Study Day Known allergy hypersensitivity PSE
